entries.text: #0Talk-1st time
Who are you?
Oh, it doesn't matter, just help me open this door.
I packed my tools in here, seeing it was vacant...
...but now somebody's gone and locked the door.
#0Talk-2nd time
I'm a blacksmith. I'm nothing without my tools.
Bring me that key. Chop chop!
#0Talk-After unlocking the door using Lenigrast's Key
Ah, yes, very good.
Now I can get to work.
But first, let me set up. Come again later.
#0Talk-After unlocking the door using Lenigrast's Key & resting at a Bonfire
You, stand back. This is dangerous work.
The name's Lenigrast. Just a simple blacksmith.
And you are...hmph! Another useless traveller.
Oh, you're that traveller. The name's Lenigrast.
I appreciate your help, but... I don't like travellers one bit.
A man ought to labour with his feet planted firmly in the earth.
Not roam around like you flirtatious vagabonds.
Oh, what does it matter... Go on, show me what you've got.
Your equipment. Let me have a look. But do it quick.
#0Talk-1st time
What? You again?
#0Talk-2nd time
You again? Can't you see that I'm busy?
#0Talk-1st time after resting at a Bonfire
Hmph, I'd given you up for dead. Almost had me worried, really...
#0Talk-2nd time after resting at a Bonfire
I knew you'd be around soon. Go on, show me what you've got.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
Drat, you're worse than my reckless daughter.
Don't spend your whole life in transit, you hear?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time
You'll need souls to repair and improve equipment.
I know only of smithing, but souls have many other uses, as well.
Don't waste your souls on useless trinkets. Think before you spend.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 3rd time, before Chloanne has arrived in Majula
Equipment can be strengthened with rare orestone. But such orestone won't come easily.
My girl knows her stones, but she's always out prancing about.
Now, there's a time for travels, but you can't wander the world forever.
Even you must have someone waiting back home...
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time, after Chloanne has arrived in Majula
My witless daughter finally came home.
Just as oblivious as she's always been.
Well, at least now I can keep an eye on her.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time, after Chloanne has arrived in Majula
Stones? Try asking my daughter.
You might be surprised.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time, after Gilligan has arrived in Majula
Now, don't go near that scum near the pit.
The scoundrel's name is Gilligan, and he's infamous in our home town.
Yes, everyone's heard of him, as he always manages to stir up trouble.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time, after Gilligan has arrived in Majula
Gilligan can certainly be helpful at times, but he's a real conniver when it comes to money.
Hah, there are even people out for his life.
And you can bet he brought it on himself.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after acquiring the Dull Ember
I see that you have an ember. Where did you get it?
I hear that embers were once used in a special process to fortify weapons.
But the whole art was lost long ago. Blacksmiths can't use embers any more.
Including myself, I'm afraid. Just keep it as a souvenir.
#0Talk-After spending 8000 souls
How goes your journey?
Take these. They should help a bit.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
Hmph. Don't waste my time.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing something
I'll be around, if you make it back.
#0After leaving abruptly
People these days...
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Now...! Watch it!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
What's that about?!
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
Well, if that's what you want!
#0Upon approaching him, after he has previously killed the protagonist
You should have stayed far away!
#0Upon killing the protagonist
Hmph, the damned fool...
#0After reducing his health to 50% or lower
The gall of it!
##Chloanne...I...
